release_note: Please enjoy a few bug fixes and performance improvements! :D
This update contains an important bug fix for users on iOS 17. Please reach out to our customer support if the issues persist! Enjoy!! :D

Alight Motion 4.0 gives you powerful new tools to build sophisticated dynamic scenes! Coordinate complex animations by using parenting to link layers and rig character joints then easily add dynamic motion or cut between shots with moving 2.5D cameras. And because all layers now have a Z coordinate in addition to X and Y you can use cameras to create parallax motion and zoom through layers as well! We ve also been working hard to make your editing process more convenient. You can zoom in for detailed editing with a simple pinch gesture and use two fingers to pan around your project. The improved media browser allows you to add multiple images or videos at once. You can even copy parts of a layer s style which can include everything from its position color opacity effects and even animations and paste it to another layer. In addition to functional changes we have also been working very hard to improve rendering performance. Preview lag should be greatly reduced in this update or totally eliminated for many projects. Of course Alight Motion is built without limits allowing you the ultimate in flexibility which means you can always build projects that are so complex that preview lag becomes unavoidable but with 4.0 you can push the limits further than ever before and we ll keep working to find ways to squeeze out even more performance. We re really excited about this update and can t wait to see what you create with it! Here s a partial list of new and improved features: Camera Objects Layer Parenting Z Coordinate Preview Pan and Zoom Layer Solo Opacity Null Objects Pixel Preview Layer Style Copy Paste Grid New Effects: Scale Assist Parenting Helper and Raster Transform Improved Effects: Random Jitter Oscillate Auto Shake Improved Media Browser Bug fixes and performance improvements
New Effects: Soft Glow Light Glow Edge Glow Bug Fixes
New Effects: Omino Diffusion Omino Glass Dark Glow Bug Fixes
New Effects: Fill Behind Magnify Background Bug Fixes
New Effects: Hollow Box Electric Edges Smooth Edges Improved the Oscillate effect it s much easier to adjust now! New frame rate options: 18fps 20fps Added Thai and Malay translations

Brand new Effect Browser with search favorites recently used effects and presets! New Effects: Hexagon Tile Rotate Hexagon Tile Shift Improved Effects: Dots Turbulence Luma Key Motion Blur Flip Layer Solid Matte Most effects have been fine tuned: Clearer parameter names and more sensible numeric scales New Effect Guide includes a detailed explanation and instructions for each effect On iPhone when editing a shape Lock Aspect Ratio and Size from Center buttons are now available Apple M1 Support! Alight Motion now runs on Mac and we ve improved the user experience when using a mouse Basic keyboard support for Mac and iPad: Z to Undo Z to Redo A to select all D to deselect and left right arrow keys to scroll timeline by one frame Media Browser now supports photos and videos in shared albums Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements

New Effects: Linear Streak Spin Streak Zoom Streak. Improved Effect: Bend. Improved vector point keyframe indicators. Warn if there are missing fonts when opening a project. Disable the HEVC export option for phones that don t support HEVC encoding it was mistakenly enabled and would cause export to fail if selected . Support for system fonts and custom fonts installed at the system level to use this feature first enable it in the side menu on the Alight Motion home screen . Fix issue where custom fonts could not be imported if a font of the same name was already installed at the system level. Fix incorrect rendering of PNG images with transparency on some devices. Free some space by using device storage more efficiently. Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.

Bug fixes and Performance Improvements For uninterrupted use of the package download feature including projects presets and templates please update to this version.

You can now use keyframe animation with points in vector drawing layers! Vector drawing layers now support multiple contours We ve added new built in shapes Two new effects: Glow Scan Bend Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

NEW Advanced Animation Easing Curves. Use these to create bounces springs repeating loops and more! New effects: Rays Bump Map and Palette Map Blurs overhauled: Fast and Precise Box Blurs have been replaced with Gaussian Blur a faster higher quality blur. Mini color picker improved: Hue selection is much easier! Try premium effects and features before you buy! Fix color picker color accuracy problem Improve shape editing Lots of other bug fixes and performance improvements

Improved effects: Pixelate 360º Viewer Swing Pinch Bulge New Demo mode limits media shown in browser: handy for live streams and screen recordings Fix issue with mini media browser sorting Fix font import issues Bug fixes and performance improvements
New Effects: Stretch Segment 360º Viewer Pixelate Watermark location can be changed to top or bottom of project except vertical projects Bug fixes and performance improvements

It is now possible to export video with alpha transparency on iOS 13 and higher. Make sure your project has a transparent background and select HEVC as the video codec when exporting. This update also fixes several critical bugs including problems with Review Play and problems when editing groups.
New Effects: Color Temperature 360º Reorient Sphere Four color Gradient Timeline improvements for more precise trimming splitting and keyframe placement Bug fixes and performance improvements

Add QR code option when sharing a project package Add localizations for more languages we now support Arabic Chinese Simplified and Traditional English French German Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Portuguese Russian Spanish Spanish Turkish and Vietnamese Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements

Alight Motion 3.0.2 You can now double tap a layer in the preview to quickly jump to the most common editing mode for that layer type. All remaining missing effects have been added see below for a complete list Several effects have been updated or improved Many bug fixes and performance improvements New Effects: Feather Move Along Path Mask Blur Matte Choker Glow Inner Glow Contour Gradient Contour Lines Smooth Bevel Stroke Taper Text Spacing Star Prism 3D Channel Remap HSV Lightning Spectral Map Inner Blur Text Transform Updated Effects: Turbulent Displace add more settings and improve defaults Repeat Along Path fix incorrect spacing between repeated layer copies Motion Blur rotation and scale blur now work correctly in non square projects such as 16:9 Drawing Progress smoother steps As always we welcome your feedback! Feel free to reach out to us at support alightcreative.com any time with questions suggestions or requests.

Alight Motion 3.0.1 You can now replace photo or video media on an existing layer in the Color Fill panel very helpful if you re re using downloaded presets . We fixed the problem where audio mute volume set to zero was sometimes ignored when exporting We fixed the problem where sometimes you couldn t save to the camera roll Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements: We ve been working hard and will keep working hard! to improve stability. To all the users who sent us feedback on the first release a big thank you from the whole Alight Motion team: You are helping us make Alight Motion better!
